alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pennington County through 245 PM MDT... At 231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Redbank Spring Campground, or 14 miles northeast of Newcastle. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Redbank Spring Campground around 245 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
